thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Dianne Willman

author: Dianne Willman
title: Dianne Willman
text: We have usually booked our cruises through a travel agent but after our last cruise where we felt we were over charged we decided to go online. Thank goodness we did!! We got a fantastic cabin with a big saving just where we wanted on the ship. We are travelling with our regular "cruiselings" but they booked through a travel agent and didn''t get such a great deal as we did. We would definitely recommend cruisesalefinder to anyone booking a cruise. Maybe we might go on another one later in the year!!
